name: Perfect Fishing: Bass Fishing
overview: Perfect Fishing - Bass Fishing is a fishing game that let's players enjoy the fun of the bass fishing competitions. The most different thing in this game from most of the rest of fighing games on PSX is that this one is more realistic: You don't see inside the water like in other games, in this one you have to wait until one fish is caught to see it. The player can compete in tournaments starting in the beginners class and advance to other cathegories. The game features different fishing pots and different weather condifitions.
